Overview
This set of samples demonstrates , how to use various combinations of the availble features of CEP for solving a particular problem. The main goal of the samples is to make you an expertise in using CEP for creating buckets with all possible configurations and using those created buckets to filter various kinds of events.
The source code used in the samples is in the following location.
https://svn.wso2.org/repos/wso2/branches/carbon/3.2.0/products/cep/1.0.0/modules/samples/
Please refers the User Guide for getting know how to create CEP buckets.
